Case_status.description: Status of a case. Cases which are discarded were previously suspected but have now been confirmed negative, and should be excluded from case counts. Cases which are omit_error were incorrectly added and should be dismissed from any data interpretation.

Pathogen_status.description: Whether the infection occured in an endemic, or non-endemic region.

Location_information.description: (GeoJSON) Curators input an initial location where the case was reported from. This query results in a location structure returned from a geocoding API, such as Mapbox

Age.description: Age of individual, specified as range, open-ended (<n, >n) or as a range delimited by a hyphen following 5 year increments (m-n)

Sex_at_birth.description: Sex at birth of an individual

Sex_at_birth_other.description: Free text entry for the sex of an individual, if not covered by 'Sex_at_birth'

Gender_other.description: Free text entry for Gender identity if not covered by 'Gender' field

enum: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

Race.description: Race of the individual, can select multiple options

Race_other.description: Free response input for the race of the individual

Ethnicity.description: Ethnicity of the individual, per the U.S. census definition

Ethnicity_other.description: Free response input for the ethnicity of the individual. Input text data as provided by the original data source; do not translate.

Nationality.description: Nationality of the individual, can select multiple

Nationality_other.description: Free response entry for the nationality of the individual, if not covered by the Nationality field.

Occupation.description: Free response entry describing the individual's occupation

Healthcare_worker.description: Whether individual is a healthcare worker

Previous_infection.description: Did the individual test positive for the infection prior to the most recent diagnosis

Co_infection.description: If the individual tested positive for another pathogen, can select multiple

Pre_existing_condition.description: If the individual has any pre-existing conditions

Pregnancy_Status.description: Is the case pregnant or post-partum?

Vaccination.description: Has the individual received a dose of vaccine

Vaccine_side_effects.description: List of symptoms experienced after receiving the vaccine

Symptoms.description: List of symptoms (i.e. cough, sore throat, etc.).

Date_report.description: Date case was first reported. Suggest adding the date of first report, such as the date first included in a situation report or other official communication

Date_onset.description: Date of onset of symptoms. May be difficult to infer from aggregate date reporting

Confirmation_method.description: Test used to perform diagnosis. Dependent on pathogen, and often already included in the definition

Date_of_first_consultation.description: Date that the individual received first clinical consultation

Reason_for_hospitalisation.description: Reason why the individual was hospitalised, can select multiple

Date_discharge_hospital.description: Date that the individual was discharged from the hospital. Note: there is a separate field for ICU discharge

Intensive_care.description: Whether individual admitted to an intensive care unit or high dependency unit at hospital

Date_admission_ICU.description: Date individual entered intensive care unit

Date_discharge_ICU.description: Date that the individual was discharged from the ICU

Home_monitoring.description: Whether individual is being remotely monitored by health officials at home without hospital admission

Isolated.description: Whether individual was isolated at home or in hospital. Dependent on context/pathogen

Outcome.description: Outcome of the disease, recovered includes inactive case counts

Date_recovered.description: Date individual recovered, inactive case status

Contact_with_case.description: Has the individual had contact with a confirmed or suspected case

Contact_ID.description: If specified, the ID of the confirmed or suspected contact

Contact_setting.description: Setting where contact occurred. HEALTH=healthcare, including laboratory exposure, PARTY=Sexual contact at night club/private party/sauna or similar setting, BAR=bar/restaurant/other small event where there was no sexual contact, LARGE=large event with no sexual contact (e.g. festival or sports event), LARGECONTACT=large event with sexual contact, UNK=unknown

Contact_setting_other.description: Contact setting not covered by Contact_setting

Contact_animal.description: Whether the individual has known contact with animals. PET=household pets excluding rodents, PETRODENTS=rodent pets, WILD=wild animals excluding rodents, WILDRODENTS=wild rodents

Contact_comment.description: Free text describing any additional contact information

Transmission.description: Most likely mode of transmission. ANIMAL = Animal to human transmission. HAI = Healthcare-associated, LAB = Transmission in a laboratory due to occupational exposure, MTCT = Transmission from mother to child during pregnancy or at birth, OTHER = Other transmission, FOMITE = Contact with contaminated material (e.g bedding, clothing, objects), PTP = Person-to-person (excluding: mother-to-child, healthcare-associated or sexual transmission), SEX = Sexual transmission, TRANSFU = parenteral transmission including intravenous drug use and transfusion, UNK = Unknown

Travel_history.description: Whether individual has travel history, domestic and/or international

Travel_history_entry.description: Date when individual entered the country

Travel_history_location.description: (GeoJSON) Location of travel obtained from geocoding API such as Mapbox

Genomics_Metadata.description: Which clade the viral strain belongs to

Accession_Number.description: Accession number of the sequence uploaded to public database

Source.description: URL of news story or government source where this case was confirmed

Source_II.description: URL of news story or government source where this case was confirmed

Source_III.description: URL of news story or government source where this case was confirmed

Source_IV.description: URL of news story or government source where this case was confirmed

Date_entry.description: Date case was entered into line list

Date_last_modified.description: Last date when case was modified in line list
